content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a chest (position -16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) 
- Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0) 
- Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0) 
- Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0) 
- Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) 
- Chests at positions (43.5, -82.5), (40.5, -80.5), (43.5, -81.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no power

### Inserter system at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5), chest (position 2.5, 0.5) and small electric pole (position 2.5, 1.5)

### Inserter system at position (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5) and chest (position 0.5, 2.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have enough fuel before using them
- Monitor the fuel levels of the burner entities and refuel them when necessary

### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before using them
- Monitor the ingredient levels of the furnaces and replenish them when necessary

### Errors when using steam engines but having no input liquid
- Ensure that the steam engines have the necessary input liquid before using them
- Monitor the input liquid levels of the steam engines and replenish them when necessary

### Errors when using boilers but being out of fuel
- Ensure that the boilers have enough fuel before using them
- Monitor the fuel levels of the boilers and refuel them when necessary

### Errors when using labs but having no power
- Ensure that the labs have a power source before using them
- Monitor the power levels of the labs and provide a power source when necessary
